titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the designation of the Gila Wilderness.
A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the designation of the Gila Wilderness.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the 100th anniversary of the designation of the Gila Wilderness, located in New Mexico.
